data.text: God, listen to my prayer,
Listen to me, and answer me,
My enemies cause me to be terrified;
I am terrified,
I am very fearful and I tremble/shake,
I said, “I wish that I had wings like a dove!
I would fly far away
I would quickly find a shelter from my enemies
Lord, confuse my enemies, and cause their plans to fail,
During each day and night they march around on top of its walls,
They destroy things everywhere.
If it were an enemy who was making fun of me,
But it is someone who is just like me, my companion,
We previously had many good talks together;
I desire/hope that my enemies will die suddenly;
But I will ask Yahweh, my God, to help me,
Each morning and each noontime and each evening I tell him what I am concerned about, and I moan,
I have very many enemies,
God is the one who has ruled everything forever,
My companion, whom I mentioned previously, betrayed his friends
What he said was easy to listen to, like butter is easy to swallow [MET],
Put your troubles in Yahweh’s hands,
God, you will cause murderers [MTY] and liars to die before they have lived half as long as they expect to live;
